description: A .bay file format is a raw image format taken from Casio digital cameras. It is a proprietary raw image format and contains unprocessed data directly from cameraâ€™s image sesors. The data contained by it is also uncompressed. They typically store a higher level of image data and provide more flexibility for post-processing and editing compared to compressed image formats like JPEG.
The format of BAY file is binary format.

instructions:
You can open BAY file using various image editing software applications e.g.

Adobe Camera RawCapture OneSilkypix Developer StudioRawTherapeeDxO PhotoLab

You can use Adobe Photoshop using a plugin Adobe Camera Raw (ACR) to convert BAY files to other formats.

PNG - Portable Network GraphicJPEG - JPEG ImageGIF - Graphical Interchange FormatPSD - Adobe Photoshop DocumentBMP - Bitmap Image
